channel.title: How do you make npcs attack back?
channel.description: I need help with making npc's fight back when you attack them.In my server when you attack an npc it only attacks once.

item.title: How do you make npcs attack back?
item.dc:creator: @killar6311 killar6311
item.description:
@killar6311 wrote:

That makes them agressive also… I want to make them fight back and not be agressive.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2008, 08:00:54 am[/size][hr]Can anyone else help?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make npcs attack back?

item.title: How do you make npcs attack back?
item.dc:creator: @lunden lunden
item.description:
@lunden wrote:

Open Npchandler.java

Search for.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158

You should see something like.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint( npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21
After

|| npcs[i].npcType == 2745

Remove the “)” and put

 || npcs[i].npcType == npcID)

Compile and run.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make npcs attack back?
